selected_quotes: Afghan refugees were once welcomed in the West as heroes of anti-communism. Now they're struggling to win asylum
Excellent piece on how Afghan refugees have been downgraded, no longer able to access protection to which entitled
Why are Afghan asylum seekers so unpopular?
